<h3 id="X38791">X(38791) = X(110)-CIRCUM-EULER-POINT OF X(546)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^10+2*(b^2+c^2)*a^8-(15*b^4-16*b^2*c^2+15*c^4)*a^6+(b^2+c^2)*(13*b^4-22*b^2*c^2+13*c^4)*a^4+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b^4-16*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^2-3*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^3  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(38791) = 9*X(2)-5*X(15021) = 9*X(2)-13*X(15029) = X(3)-3*X(113) = 2*X(3)-3*X(5972) = X(3)+3*X(7728) = 5*X(3)-9*X(14643) = 5*X(3)-3*X(16111) = 7*X(3)-3*X(20127) = 4*X(3)-3*X(37853) = 13*X(3)-9*X(38788) = X(3)-9*X(38789) = 5*X(3)+3*X(38790) = 4*X(3)-9*X(38792) = 7*X(3)-9*X(38793) = 11*X(3)-15*X(38794) = 3*X(3)-5*X(38795) = 5*X(113)-3*X(14643) = 5*X(113)-X(16111) = 7*X(113)-X(20127) = 4*X(113)-X(37853) = 13*X(113)-3*X(38788) = X(113)-3*X(38789) = 5*X(113)+X(38790) = 4*X(113)-3*X(38792) = 7*X(113)-3*X(38793) = 11*X(113)-5*X(38794) = 9*X(113)-5*X(38795) = 3*X(10990)-5*X(15021) = 3*X(10990)-13*X(15029) = 5*X(15021)-13*X(15029)
</b>
<p>
Let N<sub>A</sub> be the reflection of X(5) in the A-altitude, and define N<sub>B</sub> and N<sub>C</sub> cyclically.  N<sub>A</sub>N<sub>B</sub>N<sub>C</sub> is inversely similar to ABC, with similitude center X(195).  X(38791) = X(10564)-of-N<sub>A</sub>N<sub>B</sub>N<sub>C</sub>.  (see Hyacinthos #21522, 2/11/2013, Antreas Hatzipolakis)  (Randy Hutson, May 31, 2020)
</p>
<p>
X(38791) lies on these lines: {2,10990}, {3,113}, {4,542}, {5,541}, {20,5642}, {30,15152}, {74,3090}, {110,3146}, {125,146}, {185,12824}, {381,15027}, {382,5655}, {389,546}, {399,5076}, {511,1514}, {632,12041}, {690,38745}, {974,15012}, {1112,16625}, {1181,34155}, {1493,11805}, {1511,15704}, {1531,29012}, {1533,29317}, {1539,3627}, {1561,23698}, {1568,7464}, {2774,38769}, {2779,38781}, {2781,5893}, {2854,38801}, {2883,6593}, {3303,12374}, {3304,12373}, {3448,15044}, {3522,15023}, {3525,12244}, {3529,10721}, {3628,6699}, {3830,23236}, {3832,9140}, {3850,20379}, {3851,20126}, {3857,10264}, {3860,13393}, {5056,15057}, {5066,20396}, {5072,10620}, {5079,15061}, {5159,15125}, {5448,15115}, {5465,10991}, {5621,11479}, {5943,16270}, {6000,10297}, {6425,8998}, {6426,13990}, {6696,15113}, {6759,23043}, {7530,9932}, {7982,12368}, {8674,38757}, {9143,17578}, {9826,17855}, {10151,13148}, {10272,12103}, {10303,15055}, {10574,17853}, {10594,15473}, {10605,18418}, {10733,24981}, {11456,25556}, {11477,14982}, {11541,20125}, {11693,15681}, {11723,15178}, {12102,32423}, {12111,14448}, {12121,15039}, {12308,37493}, {12811,20304}, {12825,13417}, {12828,37197}, {13598,14984}, {14499,15156}, {14500,15157}, {14542,34802}, {14677,14869}, {14862,18563}, {15022,15059}, {15035,17538}, {15046,38728}, {15088,38725}, {15128,32305}, {16223,17854}, {16657,22330}, {18323,18400}, {18388,31861}, {20190,34664}, {22800,34563}, {32233,34725}, {32417,36169}</p>
<p>
X(38791) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 15063}, {110, 13202}, {113, 7728}, {125, 146}, {382, 30714}, {399, 12295}, {1531, 32111}, {3627, 5609}, {10721, 16163}, {10733, 24981}, {11061, 32250}, {12111, 14448}, {12825, 13417}, {16111, 38790}<br>
X(38791) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (74, 6723), (5972, 113), (12041, 12900), (15115, 5448), (17855, 9826), (20379, 3850), (20417, 5), (36253, 546), (37853, 5972), (38726, 10272)<br>
X(38791) = complement of X(10990)<br>
X(38791) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 10706, 15063), (74, 3090, 38729), (74, 36518, 6723), (113, 5972, 38792), (113, 16111, 14643), (146, 3091, 15054), (382, 5655, 30714), (546, 36253, 7687), (1539, 5609, 3627), (3090, 38729, 6723), (3091, 15054, 125), (3529, 15034, 16163), (7728, 14643, 38790), (7728, 38789, 113), (10721, 15034, 3529), (14643, 38790, 16111), (15021, 15029, 2), (36518, 38729, 3090), (37853, 38792, 5972)<br>
</p>
